About Me

I am a mechanical engineering student who enjoys turning equations into physical systems. My interests sit at the intersection of robotics, controls, and mechanical design, and I enjoy documenting each project from modeling through testing.

Outside of coursework, I focus on building prototypes, running experiments, and refining mechanical details until the performance matches the model.

What I work on

Design + CAD

Mechanical Design

Parametric CAD, iterative prototyping, and hardware integration.

Controls + Modeling

Dynamic Systems

State-space models, stability analysis, and control tuning.

Testing + Validation

Experimental Rigor

Instrumentation, data acquisition, and performance verification.

Looking for

Internships or research roles in robotics, controls, or product design where I can contribute to real hardware systems.
